All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthenticationActivity
AuthenticationActivity is responsible for handling user authentication-related operations.
AuthenticationFieldValidator
AuthenticationFieldValidator class for validating text fields for authentication in the application
Condition
The Condition class represents weather conditions.
ConditionUnitTest
 
Constants
Constants class containing all the constants used within the application.
Converters
Converters class for the Phase and Plant entities.
ConvertersUnitTest
 
ConvertIntMonthToString
ConvertIntMonthToString class to convert a month expressed as an integer to its corresponding string.
Crop
Model class representing a crop.
CropAdapter
Adapter for displaying crops in a RecyclerView.
CropAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on RecyclerView items.
CropDao
DAO interface for Crop.
CropDaoTest
 
CropDetailsActivity
Activity for displaying the details of a crop.
CropDetailsViewModel
ViewModel class for managing the details of a crop.
CropRepository
Repository class for managing Crops entities, providing data access operations and synchronization with Firestore.
CropRoomDatabase
Database class for Crop.
CropUnitTest
 
Current
The Current class represents current weather data.
CurrentUnitTest
 
Day
The Day class represents daily weather data.
DayUnitTest
 
EntryActivity
 
Enum
Utility class containing an enum for proposal status.
Enum.OfferStatus
Enum representing the status of a proposal.
FilterSearchActivity
FilterSearchActivity class to set search filters for plant searches.
FilterSearchViewModel
FilterSearchViewModel class representing the ViewModel for the FilterSearchActivity.
FirebaseResponse
FirebaseResponse class representing a response from Firebase.
FirebaseResponseUnitTest
 
Forecast
The Forecast class represents weather forecasts.
ForecastDay
The ForecastDay class represents weather forecasts for a single day.
ForecastDayAdapter
Adapter for displaying weather forecasts in a RecyclerView.
ForecastDayAdapter.ForecastDayViewHolder
ViewHolder for each item in the RecyclerView.
ForecastDayUnitTest
 
ForecastUnitTest
 
ForgotPasswordFragment
ForgotPasswordFragment displays the UI for the "forgot password" feature, allowing users to reset their password.
HomeFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for the Home screen.
HomeViewModel
ViewModel class for HomeFragment.
ICropRepository
Interface for CropRepository.
InsertCropActivity
Activity for inserting a new crop.
InsertCropViewModel
ViewModel for inserting a new crop.
InsertProductActivity
Activity for inserting a new product.
InsertProductViewModel
ViewModel for inserting a new product.
IPhaseRepository
Interface IPhaseRepository for PhaseRepository.
IPlantRepository
IPlantRepository interface for PlantRepository.
IProductRepository
Interface for ProductRepository.
IUserRepository
Interface for user repository to handle user authentication and management operations with Firebase.
IWeatherRepository
Interface for the weather data repository.
Location
This class represents a location with basic geographical information.
LocationUnitTest
 
LoginFragment
Manages the login process for the application.
LoginFragmentUnitTest
 
MainActivity
MainActivity is the main entry point of the application.
NumberPickerDialog
A dialog fragment to create a Number Picker to be displayed in the FilterSearchActivity for the fields sowingStart and sowingEnd.
Offer
The Offer class represents an offer.
OfferUnitTest
 
Phase
The Phase class is the model representing a phase.

ViewModel for managing the stand.
